channel.title: Rebound MTB App on granthutchison.com
channel.description: Recent content in Rebound MTB App on granthutchison.com

item.title: Rebound MTB App
item.description: The Rebound MTB App Part 1: The beta release For the past forever I’ve been studying with the Open University, working towards a Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering and after all that time the end is in sight!. To complete the degree I have to undertake a significant project, so I’ve teamed up with the guys at Rebound to build a mobile application to support them. Rebound is a registered charity, which aims to “develop the local community through sport” - with a primary focus on mountain biking.

item.title: Rebound App Privacy Policy
item.description: This post contains the Privacy Policy generated for the Rebound MTB app, developed in collaboration with Rebound SCIO Privacy Policy Rebound SCIO built the Rebound MTB app as an Open Source app. This SERVICE is provided by Rebound SCIO at no cost and is intended for use as is. This page is used to inform visitors regarding our policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use our Service.
